items.content:
First, you will need to get your friends so called Friend code.
It is a unique ID every NMS player gets.
To see your ID, go to multiplayer and click this button

sections.heading: How to join your friends game

items.content: To play online, open the Multiplayer menu
When you know your friends ID, click this button and type in his/ ID

After that, your friends game should appear in the list when he is online.
Now you can easily join his game.

You will see the following screen, but dont worry if your save file is locked.
You can easily fix that by playing offline with your save and leave again. Then it should appear in the list

You will spawn in the nexus.
You will have to leave it in order to get to your friends system. 
Enter your spaceship and leave the nexus. 
You will ge asked if you want to play in the current system or if you want to join your friends system.
Obviously you want to join your friends system.
